name: Polar Rollout
description:
***DEVICE REQUIREMENTS***
● iPhone 5 and up
● iPad 4 and up
● iPad Mini 2 and up
● iPod Touch 6th Gen

Ready for super-powered, ice-sliding, fish-busting action? Choose your favorite Roller and unleash magical powers in this unique line-drawing puzzle adventure!

Fishy foes from another dimension have invaded the universe and it's up to you to stop them. Create your path to each portal and defeat those pesky piranhas along the way!

HIGHLIGHTS:
● EXPLORE 120 levels across 6 uniquely-themed worlds
● DRAW your path to victory
● PHYSICS-BASED gameplay mechanics
● COLLECT new playable characters
● POWER UP with epic special abilities
● ORIGINAL & INTERACTIVE puzzles
● BEAUTIFUL graphics and animation
● CATCHY music and sound effects
● CHALLENGE your friends with GameCenter
● FUN for all ages!

Become a fan:
INSTAGRAM: Instagram.com/PolarRollout
FACEBOOK: Facebook.com/PolarRollout
TWITTER: Twitter.com/PolarRollout
WEBSITE: PolarRollout.com
